Following are courses offered at KeMU; Certificate programms, Diploma programms, Degree programms, Postgraduate Diploma programms, Masters programms, Doctorate(PhD) programms, TVET programms and Cisco programms.

There are a number of certificate programms offered, these are; Certificate in Church Ministry, Certificate in Church Music, Certificate in Food and Beverages, Certificate in Music and Instrument Operation, Certificate in Records and Archives Management, Certificate in Sign Language and Certificate in Theology.
Was created by Blessing, as a school project.
